item.title: Package rawTof
item.description: I have just released a simple package to read PTR-TOF h5 files. This used to be part of a larger project on developing a pipeline for working with PTR-TOF files, but stripped from all experimental functions. The other package should become a paper, so hold on for that. The package can be found at bdcaf/rawTof.
